Package ohos.nfc.tag

Reads and writes NFC tags module.

TagInfo: provides interfaces to create tags and obtain tag information.

TagManager: controls tag read and write. Classes for different types of tags inherit from this abstract class to control connections to tags, read data from tags, and write data to tags.

NfcATag: inherits from the TagManager abstract class to control connections to NFC-A tags, read data from NFC-A tags, and write data to NFC-A tags.

IsoDepTag: inherits from the TagManager abstract class to control connections to ISO-DEP tags, read data from ISO-DEP tags, and write data to ISO-DEP tags

MifareClassicTag: inherits from the TagManager abstract class to control connections to Mifare Classic tags, and read data from and write data to Mifare Classic tags.

NdefTag: inherits from the TagManager abstract class to control connections to NDEF tags, and read data from and write data to NDEF tags.

NdefMessage: represents the NDEF message.

MessageRecord: represents the NDEF message record.

MifareUltralightTag: inherits from the TagManager abstract class to control connections to MIFARE Ultralight tags, and read data from and write data to MIFARE Ultralight tags.

NfcBTag: inherits from the TagManager abstract class to control connections to NFC-B tags, and read data from and write data to NFC-B tags.

Since:
1
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IsoDepTag
    Provides interfaces to obtain IsoDepTag objects and tag information.
    MessageRecord
    Represents an NDEF record.
    MifareClassicTag
    Provides interfaces to create MifareClassic tags and obtain the tag information.
    MifareUltralightTag
    Provides interfaces to create a MIFARE Ultralight tag and perform I/O operations on the tag.
    NdefMessage
    Represents an NDEF message, which is a container for one or more MessageRecord objects.
    NdefTag
    Provides interfaces to create an NdefTag object, control connections to the NDEF tag, and read data from and write data to the NDEF tag.
    NfcATag
    Provides interfaces to control the read and write of tags that support the NFC-A technology.
    NfcBTag
    Provides interfaces to create an NfcBTag and perform I/O operations on the tag.
    NfcFTag
    Provides methods for creating an NFC-F tag, obtaining tag information, and controlling tag read and write.
    NfcVTag
    Provides methods for creating an NFC-V tag, obtaining tag information, and controlling tag read and write.
    TagInfo
    Provides tag information.
    TagManager
    Controls tag read and write.
